layout.name: tagstext
layout.title: Tags
layout.tooltip: If you set a tag, only amped jewels that share a tag can connect. Set this to blank to prevent any type of connnections

layout.name: ontime
layout.title: On Time
layout.tooltip: Tha amount of frames the amped jewel should stay on

layout.name: offtime
layout.title: Off Time
layout.tooltip: Tha amount of frames the amped jewel should stay off. Set to 0 to make the amped jewel always stay on
